query: SELECT id, title, slug, targetLanguage, category, pathNumber, status, totalModules, totalLessons, totalActivities FROM courses WHERE slug LIKE '%path%' ORDER BY pathNumber; SELECT id, title, slug, level, status FROM learning_paths ORDER BY displayOrder;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT id, title, slug, targetLanguage, category, pathNumber, status, totalModules, totalLessons, totalActivities FROM courses WHERE slug LIKE '%path%' ORDER BY pathNumber; SELECT id, title, slug, level, status FROM learning_paths ORDER BY displayOrder;
